use.js(1,19): error TS2307: Cannot find module './mod' or its corresponding type declarations.


==== use.js (1 errors) ====
    var mod = require('./mod');
                      ~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module './mod' or its corresponding type declarations.
    mod.f('no')
    mod.g('also no')
    mod.h(0)
    mod.i(1)
    
==== mod.js (0 errors) ====
    /** @param {number} n */
    exports.f = exports.g = function fg(n) {
        return n + 1
    }
    /** @param {string} mom */
    module.exports.h = module.exports.i = function hi(mom) {
        return `hi, ${mom}!`;
    }
